document_data.name: Citadel of the Respected
document_data.source: [[A Dozen and One Adventures|A Dozen and One Adventures (Campaign Book)]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Citadel of the Respected''' was a fortress located in [[Muluk]], the City of Kings, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Citadel stood at the mouth of [[Al-Zalim River]] upon an artificial mount, providing easy access to any threats to Muluk approaching from the [[Great Sea]]. The Citadel was armed with three massive [[siege engine]]s capable of hurling boulders at any attacking ships.
document_data.Activities: The [[Respected Mamluk Society]] within the city of Muluk operated out of the Citadel, giving the Citadel its name.
